notes.text: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 23 for SLE 12 SP2)
notes.title: Title of the patch

notes.text:
This update for the Linux Kernel 4.4.121-92_85 fixes one issue.

The following security issue was fixed:

- CVE-2018-14734: drivers/infiniband/core/ucma.c allowed ucma_leave_multicast to access a certain data structure after a cleanup step in ucma_process_join, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (use-after-free) (bsc#1131390).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: drivers/infiniband/core/ucma.c in the Linux kernel through 4.17.11 allows ucma_leave_multicast to access a certain data structure after a cleanup step in ucma_process_join, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service (use-after-free).
notes.title: Vulnerability description
